project.name: Gentoo Handbook
project.description: The Gentoo Handbook project aims to write down and maintain a Gentoo Linux Handbook.
project.longdescription: The Installation Guide, once a couple of pages long, is already counting more than 20 pages. More users are using Gentoo nowadays, and require more concise documentation, with examples etc. A handbook makes sure that the Documentation Team can continue developing documentation without restricting the amount of information they can put in a document.
